title: Snowdown Poppy Skin Concept

embed.description: A League of Legends skin concept for Poppy. I would've liked to have this done during the seasonal event, but switched designs half way in.

body: A fanart project I recently finished for a Snowdown Poppy skin. I would've liked to post this during the seasonal event, but I ended up switching designs halfway through. Tons of fun anyways, hope you guys like it!

replies.body: can you look my braum project skin{{champion:201}}   http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/yIj9eb1t-skin-for-brau  {{champion:201}}
Thank you, it's always a pleasure! :)
I like the snow fashion and Palm top better tbh. They Look cuter this outfit looks manly on her

Thanks for the feedback! Originally, I was looking to have a more flowy design (Jinglebell in particular) but decided that Snowscooper fit more thematically for Poppy and her abilities. I might do a cuter redesign in the future, so we'll see.
I love this. It looks fantastic and i would play poppy more with this skin.
Thank you, I'm glad you like it!
Love it. Usually I only come here to downvote everything in this forum, but this, this I'll upvote.
Thanks so much, I appreciate it!
